name: Crystal Vibes feat. Ott.
summary:
Official selection of Sundance Film Festival New Frontier and Kaleidoscope Showcase Vol. 2, now available for you to experience for free! 
 
Experience candy-colored psychedelic sound rippling through an endless crystal universe. This VR music visualizer demo, Crystal Vibes, utilizes the cutting edge of spatial 3D audio and sound visualization that maps sound and light based on the science of the human senses, to push the frontiers of technology-mediated sensory experience in virtual reality. With the project's predecessor described as “transcendent” and “like traveling through a psychedelic kaleidoscope” (Forbes 2016), this piece ups the ante with music from producer Ott.
